industry: Aviation and Aerospace Component Manufacturing and Defense and Space Manufacturing
description:
About the Job: As a Planner/Buyer, you will coordinate planning and procurement for aerospace manufacturing projects, ensuring timely material availability, managing suppliers, and optimizing inventory. Key Responsibilities:
  • Production Planning:
  • Maintain production schedules based on demand and capacity.
  • Coordinate material availability with production teams.
  • Ensure materials meet specifications with engineering and QA.
  • Material Planning:
  • Align schedules with demand forecasts.
  • Optimize inventory levels to balance availability and costs.
  • Procurement Management:
  • Evaluate and negotiate with suppliers.
  • Manage purchase orders and track deliveries.
  • Supplier Management:
  • Maintain and monitor supplier relationships and performance.
  • Inventory Control:
  • Implement control measures and conduct audits for accuracy.
  • Continuous Improvement:
  • Identify and implement process improvements.
  • Stay informed on industry trends and advancements.
Qualifications and Skills:
  • Degree in Supply Chain Management, Business, Engineering, or related field.
  • 5+ years in aerospace procurement or supply chain management.
  • Knowledge of aerospace manufacturing processes.
  • Proficiency in ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle).
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Familiarity with aerospace regulatory requirements and Lean/Six Sigma methodologies.
